Carlos A. Estala Velasco

docs.title: 📬 Contact
docs.text:
If you'd like to get in touch, feel free to reach out through any of the following:

  • 📧 Primary Email: estalav@gmail.com

docs.title: Education & Certifications
docs.text:
• Master’s in Information Systems
  • Bachelor’s in Business Management
  • SAP Enterprise Architecture

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC (Nov 2024 – Present)
docs.text:
Global Co-Lead, SAP AppHaus Network Partners & Enterprise Architect

  • Define and drive the global SAP AppHaus Network strategy, accelerating partner innovation and SAP BTP adoption.
  • Spearheaded innovation space openings in North America (Houston, Minneapolis) and LATAM, with upcoming expansion to the East Coast.
  • Aligned global partners with SAP’s AI and cloud solutions to drive business transformation.
  • Designed business AI workshops with Generative AI and LLMs to boost automation and integration.
  • Enabled successful SAP 2024 Innovation Awards submissions; contributed to SAPPHIRE 2025 preparations.
  • Delivered architectural expertise: Solution Concepts, Realization, Data Diagrams, and API design.

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC (Feb 2023 – Oct 2024)
docs.text:
Regional Lead for NA and LAC & SAP AppHaus Network Partners & Enterprise Architect

  • Expanded AppHaus Partner Network in LAC and refreshed North America partner strategies.
  • Led digital transformation efforts for NBA, Cirque du Soleil, Mercado Libre, Petrobras, and Claro.
  • Advanced adoption of SAP AI Agents and AI readiness across customers and SAP teams.
  • Delivered internal/external AI workshops: https://apphaus.sap.com/resource/business-ai-explore-workshop

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC (Aug 2018 – Jan 2023)
docs.text:
SAP IT Principal Consultant, GCS Global Cloud Services

  • Led SAP BTP and GCP integration for enterprise clients.
  • Built Monitoring & Observability platform with Dynatrace, Kyma, and Splunk.
  • Automated cloud operations using Terraform and StackStorm (self-healing, SLIs/SLOs).
  • Managed Kubernetes clusters, Docker images, GCP Galaxy, and billing.

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC (Mar 2013 – Jul 2018)
docs.text:
SAP IT Technology Senior Consultant, GCS Global Cloud Services

  • Delivered SAP ECC/BW/PI/PO migrations for Palo Alto teams, with HANA Cloud integration.
  • Supported SAP HANA Database launch via PoC deployments.
  • Optimized incident management with PagerDuty, Focused Run, Dynatrace, and Splunk.
  • Integrated ServiceNow ITSM for automated ticket resolution and executive analytics.

docs.title: SAP Mexico (Mar 2010 – Feb 2013)
docs.text:
Technical Quality Manager, SAP AGS, MaxAttention

  • Delivered high-visibility transformation projects for Coca-Cola Femsa and Palacio de Hierro.
  • Led end-to-end SAP installation, configuration, and safeguarding of ERP, Retail, and HR systems.
  • Specialized in SAP HANA, virtualization, clustering, and system migrations.
  • Led BW-HANA migration and managed SAP quality gates across 5 implementation projects.

docs.title: SAP Mexico (Mar 2007 – Feb 2010)
docs.text:
SAP Contractor – Database Manager, Global DBA

  • Provided 2nd-level DB support for SAP Hosting (Germany, US) and worked with teams in Ireland & India.
  • Led No-Unicode to Unicode migrations, SAP stack installs, and EarlyWatch setups.
  • SAP NetWeaver certified. Managed Oracle, DB2, MaxDB, MySQL, and MSSQL environments.
  • Performed system upgrades, performance analysis, and SAP migrations.

docs.title: Stellantis / Chrysler Mexico (Sep 2002 – Feb 2007)
docs.text:
E-Business & E-Connect Lead – DBA

  • Migrated legacy platforms to scalable cloud-based infrastructure to boost enterprise efficiency.

docs.title: Moredata, Portugal (Sep 2001 – Aug 2002)
docs.text:
Developer / DB Specialist

  • Built internet-based platforms for Portugal Telecom.
  • Early work on digital innovation connecting Portuguese and Mexican markets.

docs.title: Intelligas, Mexico (Sep 2000 – Aug 2001)
docs.text:
Linux & DB Specialist

  • Built transportation/logistics tools using Informix, radio-frequency tech, and early internet access.

docs.title: Key Competencies
docs.text:
• Executive Leadership & Global Strategy
  • AI & Generative AI Innovation
  • Cloud Solutions & SAP BTP
  • Partner Ecosystem Development
  • Design Thinking & Human-Centered Innovation
  • Business Process Optimization
  • Hyperscaler Integration (Google Cloud, AWS, Azure)
  • High-Profile Stakeholder Engagement
